---
title: "BigQuery"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(dbplyr)
library(bigrquery)
library(DBI)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r db_connect}
db <- dbConnect(
  bigquery(),
  project = "bigquery-public-data",
  #dataset = "austin_311",
  dataset = "ncaa_basketball",
  billing = "My Billing Account"
)

dbListTables(
  db
)

team_colors <- tbl(
  db,
  "team_colors"
)

data_pull <- bq_dataset_query(
  db,
  "
    select
      *
    from
      team_colors ;
  "
)
      #`bigquery-public-data.ncaa_basketball.team_colors` ;

dbDisconnect(db)
```
